verses.John 3:16: For God so loved the world that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him should not perish but have everlasting life.
verses.John 3:17: For God did not send His Son into the world to condemn the world, but that the world through Him might be saved.
verses.John 3:18: He who believes in Him is not condemned; but he who does not believe is condemned already because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God.
